scripts.debug:HivemindServiceFunction: sam local invoke HivemindServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.json
scripts.package:lambda: npm run build && cd .aws-sam/build && zip -r -D -j HivemindServiceFunction.zip HivemindServiceFunction/*
scripts.deploy:lambda:dev: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run package:lambda && npm run deploy:lambda:hivemind-service
scripts.debug:HivemindServiceFunction:invoke:dev: npm run build:lambda:dev && cp .env.dev .env && sam local invoke HivemindServiceFunction --env-vars events/env.dev.json --debug-port 5858 --event events/event.action.invoke.json
